reasoning: Reporting incidence of new diagnoses. Childhood LCH incidence is 4-5 cases per million children per year, approximately 0.5 per 100k overall population when accounting for pediatric demographic proportion.
source: Stalemark H et al. (2008). Incidence of Langerhans cell histiocytosis in children: a population-based study. Pediatr Blood Cancer. 51(1):76-81
